title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3364 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 2, 2017
On Wednesday, August 2, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 3364, the “Countering America’s Adversaries Through Sanctions Act,” which strengthens and expands statutory sanctions on Iran, Russia, and North Korea, and for other purposes.
